item.title: Miles Davis - Kind of Blue
item.description: Release Date: August 17, 1959 Why itâ€™s exceptional: The best-selling jazz album of all time, Kind of Blue is a modal jazz masterpiece. Miles Davis, with Coltrane, Adderley, and Evans, redefined improvisation with minimal chord changes and maximum emotional depth.
